Package com.example.inventorypro

Class SynchronizedList<T1>

java.lang.Object
com.example.inventorypro.SynchronizedList<T1>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ItemList, TagList
public abstract class SynchronizedList<T1> extends Object
Synchronized list is a collection of objects that are synced with the database and support operations like adding/deleting.
